person.persName: Addison M. Ballard (Henry County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Spotsylvania County, Virginia, native. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in Henry County in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned eighteen enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.
